answers.answer: No but if on for a long time will increase risk of cataracts.

question: Hello Doctor,If I had barrage laser done some time ago and I sometimes see flashes of light and still have some floaters but I have to take nasal steroids because of horrible allergy is it possible that use of those steroids will cause retinal detachment or make my tears worst?
title: Does taking nasal steroids dangerous if I have retinal tears?
